```go
	Links []Link `json:"links"`
	Meta Meta `json:"meta"`
}
```

```typescript
  nodes: Node[];
  links: Link[];
  meta: Meta;
}
```

## Link

**Source**: [`graph/models.go:26`](https://github.com/teranos/QNTX/blob/main/graph/models.go#L26)


<table>
<tr>
<th>Go Source</th>
<th>TypeScript</th>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>

```go
type Link struct {
	Source string `json:"source"`
	Target string `json:"target"`
	Type string `json:"type"`
	Weight float64 `json:"value"`
	Label string `json:"label,omitempty"`
	Hidden bool `json:"hidden,omitempty"`
}
```

</td>
<td>

```typescript
export interface Link {
  /**
   * Node ID
   */
  source: string;
  /**
   * Node ID
   */
  target: string;
  /**
   * Predicate from attestation (e.g., "performed_by", "released_on", "genre_of")
   */
  type: string;
  /**
   * Link strength/weight (D3 uses "value")
   */
  value: number;
  label?: string;
  /**
   * Phase 2: Server-controlled visibility
   */
  hidden?: boolean;
}
```

</td>
</tr>
</table>

## Meta

**Source**: [`graph/models.go:36`](https://github.com/teranos/QNTX/blob/main/graph/models.go#L36)


<table>
<tr>
<th>Go Source</th>
<th>TypeScript</th>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>

```go
type Meta struct {
	GeneratedAt time.Time `json:"generated_at"`
	Stats Stats `json:"stats"`
	Config map[string]string `json:"config"`
	NodeTypes []NodeTypeInfo `json:"node_types"`
	RelationshipTypes []RelationshipTypeInfo `json:"relationship_types"`
}
```

</td>
<td>

```typescript
export interface Meta {
  generated_at: string;
  stats: Stats;
  config: Record<string, string>;
  /**
   * Available node types in this graph
   */
  node_types: NodeTypeInfo[];
  /**
   * Available relationship types with physics
   */
  relationship_types: RelationshipTypeInfo[];
}
```

</td>
</tr>
</table>

## Node

**Source**: [`graph/models.go:15`](https://github.com/teranos/QNTX/blob/main/graph/models.go#L15)


<table>
<tr>
<th>Go Source</th>
<th>TypeScript</th>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>

```go
type Node struct {
	ID string `json:"id"`
	Type string `json:"type"`
	TypeSource string `json:"-"`
	Label string `json:"label"`
	Visible bool `json:"visible"`
	Group int `json:"group"`
	Metadata map[string]interface{} `json:"metadata"`
}
```

</td>
<td>

```typescript
export interface Node {
  id: string;
  /**
   * Node type from attestations ("artist", "album", "genre") or "untyped"
   */
  type: string;
  /**
   * Display label
   */
  label: string;
  /**
   * Backend controls visibility
   */
  visible: boolean;
  /**
   * For coloring/clustering (from type definitions)
   */
  group: number;
  metadata: Record<string, unknown>;
}
```

</td>
</tr>
</table>

## NodeTypeInfo

**Source**: [`graph/models.go:45`](https://github.com/teranos/QNTX/blob/main/graph/models.go#L45)


<table>
<tr>
<th>Go Source</th>
<th>TypeScript</th>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>

```go
type NodeTypeInfo struct {
	Type string `json:"type"`
	Label string `json:"label"`
	Color string `json:"color"`
	Count int `json:"count"`
}
```

</td>
<td>

```typescript
export interface NodeTypeInfo {
  /**
   * e.g., "artist", "album", "genre"
   */
  type: string;
  /**
   * Human-readable display name (e.g., "Artist", "Album")
   */
  label: string;
  /**
   * Hex color code
   */
  color: string;
  /**
   * Number of nodes of this type
   */
  count: number;
}
```

</td>
</tr>
</table>

## RelationshipDefinition

**Source**: [`graph/relationship_types.go:11`](https://github.com/teranos/QNTX/blob/main/graph/relationship_types.go#L11)


<table>
<tr>
<th>Go Source</th>
<th>TypeScript</th>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>

```go
type RelationshipDefinition struct {
	PredicateName string
	DisplayLabel string
	Color string
	LinkDistance *float64
	LinkStrength *float64
	Deprecated bool
}
```

</td>
<td>

```typescript
export interface RelationshipDefinition {
  /**
   * e.g., "is_child_of", "points_to"
   */
  PredicateName: string;
  /**
   * Human-readable label
   */
  DisplayLabel: string;
  /**
   * Optional link color override
   */
  Color: string;
  /**
   * D3 force distance (nil = use default)
   */
  LinkDistance?: number | null;
  /**
   * D3 force strength (nil = use default)
   */
  LinkStrength?: number | null;
  /**
   * Whether this relationship type is deprecated
   */
  Deprecated: boolean;
}
```

</td>
</tr>
</table>

## RelationshipTypeInfo

**Source**: [`graph/models.go:53`](https://github.com/teranos/QNTX/blob/main/graph/models.go#L53)


<table>
<tr>
<th>Go Source</th>
<th>TypeScript</th>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>

```go
type RelationshipTypeInfo struct {
	Type string `json:"type"`
	Label string `json:"label"`
	Color string `json:"color,omitempty"`
	LinkDistance *float64 `json:"link_distance,omitempty"`
	LinkStrength *float64 `json:"link_strength,omitempty"`
	Count int `json:"count"`
}
```

</td>
<td>

```typescript
export interface RelationshipTypeInfo {
  /**
   * Predicate name (e.g., "is_child_of", "points_to")
   */
  type: string;
  /**
   * Human-readable display name
   */
  label: string;
  /**
   * Optional link color override
   */
  color?: string;
  /**
   * D3 force distance override (nil = use default)
   */
  link_distance?: number | null;
  /**
   * D3 force strength override (nil = use default)
   */
  link_strength?: number | null;
  /**
   * Number of links of this type
   */
  count: number;
}
```

</td>
</tr>
</table>

## TypeDefinition

**Source**: [`graph/node_types.go:11`](https://github.com/teranos/QNTX/blob/main/graph/node_types.go#L11)


<table>
<tr>
<th>Go Source</th>
<th>TypeScript</th>
</tr>
<tr>
<td>

```go
type TypeDefinition struct {
	TypeName string
	DisplayColor string
	DisplayLabel string
	Deprecated bool
	Opacity float64
}
```

</td>
<td>

```typescript
export interface TypeDefinition {
  /**
   * e.g., "artist", "album", "genre"
   */
  TypeName: string;
  /**
   * Hex color or rgba() string
   */
  DisplayColor: string;
  /**
   * Human-readable label
   */
  DisplayLabel: string;
  /**
   * Whether this type is deprecated
   */
  Deprecated: boolean;
  /**
   * Optional opacity (default 1.0)
   */
  Opacity: number;
}
```

</td>
</tr>
</table>
